DependsOn: Component, Study_id, GrantView Key, ProjectView Key, Study Name, Study Description, Study Investigator, PersonView Key, Study Reuse Statement
DependsOn Component: Grant View, Project View, Person View

Description: Description of the study, including the types of experimental assays, model systems, types of analysis, etc.
Investigator(s) associated with the project. Multiple names should be provided as a comma-separated list.
The funder-, contributor-, patient-, etc., derived content that includes terms, conditions, or statements associated with accessing and reusing the resource(s).
A unique primary key that enables record updates using schematic.
